meanings.definition: The distance between the centers of the front and rear wheels on a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The wheelbase of the car affects its stability on the road.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic measured the wheelbase of the truck to ensure proper alignment.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that the wheelbase of the clown car was so long, it could fit a whole circus inside!
meanings.sent4: The wheelbase of the bicycle was so short, it felt like riding a unicycle.
meanings.sent5: The long wheelbase of the limousine made it look elegant and luxurious.
